column4: Hello , I would like to know what the correct way to write this sentence : 1. i installed ICQ in my computer . 2. i installed ICQ on my computer ?
but from thos 2 lines which one is better :  1. i installed ICQ in my computer . 2. i installed ICQ on my computer ?
it is TO not in or on but if you have to use one of the two it would be on
